document.masterDocTitle: Nephrotoma Meigen (Diptera, Tipulidae) from Xinjiang, China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Nephrotoma Meigen (Diptera, Tipulidae) from Xinjiang, China

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Tipula cornicina
Linnaeus, 1758 : 586
. Type locality: Europe.

Tipula flavomaculata De
Geer, 1776 : 347
. Type locality: not given (?Sweden).
Tipula iridicolor
Schummel, 1833 : 101
. Type locality: Poland: near Wroclaw.
Tipula sannio
Meigen, 1838 : 36
. Type locality: not given (? Near Stolberg)

Tipula petiolata
Zetterstedt, 1838 : 846
. Type locality: Sweden: Kengis.

Nephrotoma nigrina
Savchenko, 1973 : 36
. Type locality: Russia: Orlovka, Dzavachet Mountains.

subSubSection.paragraph: Diagnosis. Occipital marking extended up to top of vertex. Deep median incision of posterior extension of tergite 9 apically widely V-shaped, with black spines. Clasper of gonostylus with elongated backward crest. Median projection of sternite 8 knob-like at tip.

Material examined.
